@@ -1,12 +1,15 @@
-CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetIndexesId(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
+CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetIndexes(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
 RETURNS TABLE
 AS
 RETURN(
-	SELECT DISTINCT 
-		i.index_id indexId
+	SELECT
+        i.object_id objectId,
+        OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(i.object_id) schemaName,
+        OBJECT_NAME(i.object_id) objectName,
+        i.index_id indexId,
+        i.name indexName
 	FROM sys.indexes i
-		INNER JOIN sys.objects o ON i.object_id = o.object_id
 	WHERE i.name IS NOT NULL -- Виключаємо HEAP індекси
 		AND i.is_hypothetical = 0 -- Виключаємо гіпотетичні індекси
-		AND (@object IS NULL OR o.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
+		AND (@object IS NULL OR i.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
 );

@@ -7,9 +7,9 @@
         OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(i.object_id) schemaName,
         OBJECT_NAME(i.object_id) objectName,
         i.index_id indexId,
         i.name indexName
-	FROM sys.indexes i
+    FROM sys.indexes i
 	WHERE i.name IS NOT NULL -- Виключаємо HEAP індекси
 		AND i.is_hypothetical = 0 -- Виключаємо гіпотетичні індекси

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetIndexes(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
+RETURNS TABLE
+AS
+RETURN(
+	SELECT
+        i.object_id objectId,
+        OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(i.object_id) schemaName,
+        OBJECT_NAME(i.object_id) objectName,
+        i.index_id indexId,
+        i.name indexName
+    FROM sys.indexes i
+	WHERE i.name IS NOT NULL -- Виключаємо HEAP індекси
+		AND i.is_hypothetical = 0 -- Виключаємо гіпотетичні індекси
+		AND (@object IS NULL OR i.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
+);

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
CREATE FUNCTION util.metadataGetIndexesId(@object NVARCHAR(128) = NULL)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN(
	SELECT DISTINCT 
		i.index_id indexId
	FROM sys.indexes i
		INNER JOIN sys.objects o ON i.object_id = o.object_id
	WHERE i.name IS NOT NULL -- Виключаємо HEAP індекси
		AND i.is_hypothetical = 0 -- Виключаємо гіпотетичні індекси
		AND (@object IS NULL OR o.object_id = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(INT, @object), OBJECT_ID(@object)))
);
